_source.text: 3:10 pm, SC 1307 Speaker : Charles Martin, Vandebilt University Title : Perturbations of Green Functions and the Dirichlet Problem Abstract : The Dirichlet problem for the Laplacian on a domain is better understood and more easily computed than it is for that of a more general elliptic operator.

text: 3:10 pm, SC 1307 Speaker : **Charles** **Martin**, Vandebilt University Title : Perturbations of Green
Functions and the Dirichlet Problem Abstract : The Dirichlet problem for the Laplacian on a domain **is**
**better** understood and more easily computed than it is for that of a more general elliptic operator.
